title: Players Rising Up Draft Boards & Draft Prospect Debates
itunes:title: Players Rising Up Draft Boards & Draft Prospect Debates
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys discuss players that are rising up draft boards around the league (1:13). Then, the duo each give their take on the announcement of the draft going on as scheduled (17:55). Next, the pair react to the news of the Cowboys engaging in contract talks with QB Dak Prescott again (23:25). After that, the guys look at draft prospect debates going on in draft rooms (26:18). Then, DJ gives a cornerback prospect that should be talked about more (35:00). To wrap up the show, the pair explain the way touches could change for running backs going into their second contracts. (37:42).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
